description:
We would like to invite you to our “Summer Garden BBQ” this Sunday, June 22nd starting at 15:00. After the BBQ, at 18:00 we will have the screening of the WC match "Belgium vs. Russia" on a huge screen. 

Please join us for our last dinner event before the summer break with your family and friends in the cozy garden of Sazz’N Jazz and enjoy the <b style="font-size : 16px">World Cup excitement altogether.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lZLYkZ27-Kk&list=UUtH7VXC4kowqhH2-RMq0F-Q

We hope to use this opportunity to strengthen the connections between our members as well as to introduce TCP to the newcomers. A glass of wine/beer or soft beverage will be served as a welcome drink.

You can buy online your tickets for 15 EUR on Eventbrite or by making a bank transfer to the following account before June 21th:

http://www.eventbrite.com/e/tcp-summer-garden-bbq-tickets-11975461929

OR

Cagri CAYLAK: BE[masked]

Please note that there are limited tickets available for the BBQ.

The BBQ Menu:
- Starter with Turkish appetizers: carrots with yogurt, mix of eggplant and zucchini with olive oil, rice with curry sauce, hot mixed vegetable, seasonal salad...
- BBQ: sausage, meatballs, chicken, marinated skewer.
- Dessert: ice cream accompanied with watermelon and melon. A bottle of water will be served as complimentary.

Facebook event page: https://www.facebook.com/events/1464594483784859
To contact us, please send an e-mail to [masked].

Date: 22 June 2014 at 15:00.
Venue: Sazz’N Jazz, Rue Royale 241 - 1210 Brussels.
name: TCP Summer Garden BBQ w/ Red Devils Screening!

description:
Turkish Connection Platform (TCP) proudly presents the first Speaker in the new TCP Talks series: Mr. Özer Dicle- Head of Consumer & Trade Marketing Benelux at JT International.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SOt6lt7qqDw

TCP is launching a new event series named "TCP Talks", where entrepreneurs, successful businessmen/women and innovators will be invited in order to share their experiences, advices and information in various areas. Each "TCP Talks" event will be organized as a presentation or speech, followed by an interactive discussion and Q&A time, ending with a ‘vin d’honneur’ which also doubles as a participant mixer.


Turkish Connections Platform is excited to invite you to the TCP Talks event which will take place on Thursday, June 26th. During this Talk, Mr. Özer Dicle, will be sharing his personal experiences on Leadership and Entrepreneurship in Business Life.


Agenda

19:00-19:05 Welcome words by TCP

19:05-20:30 Presentation by Mr. Özer Dicle

Questions & Answers 

20:30-21:00 Networking cocktail
name: TCP Talks: Mr. Özer Dicle - Head of Consumer & Trade Marketing Benelux, JTI

description:
After a successful start with the first session of the TCP Talks with Mr. Özer Dicle, Turkish Connections Platform (TCP) is excited to invite you to the second round in the TCP Talks series: TCP Coaching Experience.

During this 2 hour event Nil Agacdiken and Veronique Pivetta, two TCP members who are certified coaches, will share their personal experience with coaching and explore what coaching really is and how it can help people to access their full potential.

Date: Wednesday, 9th July, 2014, 19:00 to 21:00
Venue: TÜSİAD EU Brussels Representative Office (13, Avenue des Gaulois, Brussels 1040)


About the speakers:

- Nil Agacdiken has been working in an international organisation in the aviation domain since 18 years. In addition to her corporate job, she started a coaching journey in 2008 for her personal growth, which quickly became her passion when she experienced the power of change from within. After having followed various seminars and going through a personal journey for some years, she decided to share this experience and to be trained as a professional coach in 2010. She completed the coaching training by The Coaching Square, a Belgian school and obtained the ACC(Associate Certified Coach) certification by the International Coach Federation (ICF) in 2013.

Currently she is working as an internal coach of the Agency in addition to her corporate role.


- Véronique Pivetta is a certified Advanced Transformative Coach. Her coaching journey started in 2011, when she left her corporate career to look for a different way to be in the world. She started off with a six month professional coaching training in Los Angeles and has been an avid student ever since, traveling through the United States, Canada, Switserland and the UK extensively to deepen her understanding with the best teachers in the field of Three Principles Coaching. She's had the honor to speak at big international coaching conferences like Tikun’s Innate Health Conference in London and the 3PGC Conference in Saint Paul MN.

She now has a private practice as a coach in Belgium, working with clients in Dutch, French and English. (Please visit veronique-pivetta.com for more information.)
name: TCP Talks II: "Coaching Experience" with Nil Agacdiken & Veronique Pivetta

description:
TCP is pleased to invite you all to our traditional “Season Opening Cocktail" on October 9th, Thursday starting at 19:30 at Cospaia, Louise.

The opening event of the new season will give us the opportunity to strengthen our connections as well as to introduce TCP to newcomers. Additionally, the participants will get the chance to meet a diverse group of professionals and be informed about TCP's upcoming activities, mainly on the topics: EU, Innovation & Entrepreneurship and Social & Cultural Events.

In the entrance, you will be given a voucher for your first welcome drink (wine, beer or soft beverage). Please note that there are limited numbers of voucher. During the entire evening, appetizers (canapé, chips, nuts...) will be served as well.


We would like to thank every one of you for your devoted commitment to our organization. We believe that TCP will continue to grow and realize its future objectives with your valuable contributions.


We are looking forward to seeing you all at the “TCP Season Opening Cocktail”!

For more information:  http://en.cospaia.be/en/welcome.htm
name: TCP Season Opening Cocktail

description:
We would like to invite you all to our Thematic Group (TG) Meeting scheduled on 25th of October, Saturday at 12:00 pm, at Aloft Hotel Schuman in order to shape and realize the upcoming projects on our agenda with your participation and active volunteering.


Turkish Connections Platform (TCP) is a Non-Profit Organization, well-known by its own brands: TCP Thematic Group Meeting, TCP Dinner, TCP Talks and TCP Cocktail. Our members are participating to our activities from neighboring cities like Ghent, Leuven, Antwerp and even Lille, France.


TCP aims to connect people from diverse interests and working areas in order to reinforce relations between Turkey and Europe. Different Thematic Groups within TCP emerged from this diversity are: European Union (EU) Communications, Innovation & Entrepreneurship and Social & Cultural Events.


We are eagerly counting on your participation to share your thoughts, comments and ideas in order to achieve another productive year all together. We believe that TCP will continue to grow and realize its future objectives with your devoted commitment to our organization.


Details of the venue http://www.aloftbrussels.com/


To contact us, please send an e-mail to [masked]
name: TCP Thematic Group Meeting @ Aloft Hotel, Saturday, October 25th (12:00pm)
